label: AB_hP8_194_f_f-003
title: $\beta$-GaSe Structure
comments: GaSe takes on a variety of structures depending on the stacking of the Ga$_{2}$Se$_{2}$ layers: \begin{itemize} \item $\beta$-GaSe (this structure) is in space group \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_hP8_194_f_f-003}{$P6_3/mmc$ \#194}. \item $\gamma$-GaSe is in space group \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_hR4_160_2a_2a-001}{$R3m$ \#160}. \item $\delta$-GaSe is in space group \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_hP16_186_2a2b_2a2b-001}{$P6_{3}mc$ \#186}. \item $\epsilon$-GaSe is in space group \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_hP8_187_gh_gh-001}{$P\overline{6}m2$ \#187}. \end{itemize}
